TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit HttpParseException extends System.Web.HttpException
Public NotInheritable Class HttpParseException Inherits HttpException
public ref class HttpParseException sealed : System::Web::HttpException

summary.span: 发生分析错误时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a parse error occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个特定于 HTTP 的异常类，使 ASP.NET 可以输出分析器异常信息。The class is an HTTP-specific exception class that enables ASP.NET to output parser exception information. 引发和处理异常的详细信息，请参阅[异常](~/docs/standard/exceptions/index.md)。For more information on throwing and handling exceptions, see [Exceptions](~/docs/standard/exceptions/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用自定义页面分析期间生成的错误。The following example demonstrates how to use the to customize errors generated during page parsing. 在此示例中，自定义定义控件。In this example, a customized control is defined. 自定义控件的子元素不是指定类型的然后会引发在重写方法的自定义。If child elements of the custom control are not of a specified type then an is thrown in the overridden method of a custom . 若要生成分析异常，更改子元素文本`MyCustomOption`到任何其他字符串。To generate a parse exception, change the child element literal `MyCustomOption` to any other string. [!code-aspx-csharp[HttpParseException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/HttpParseException/cs/source.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HttpParseException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/HttpParseException/vb/source.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[HttpParseException#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/HttpParseException/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[HttpParseException#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/HttpParseException/vb/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的物理路径具有以下错误，除非该物理路径的源文件`null`，在这种情况下它将返回`null`。The property returns the physical path to the source file that has the error unless the physical path is `null`, in which case it returns `null`.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，使用有关异常的信息设置 对象。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, sets the object with information about the exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置用针对于序列化的所有异常对象数据的对象。The method sets a object with all the exception object data targeted for serialization. 在反序列化，从通过流传输的 SerializationInfo 重建异常。During deserialization, the exception is reconstituted from the SerializationInfo transmitted over the stream. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何定义一个派生可序列化类，该类实现方法，其中两个属性对进行次要更改，随后调用基类来执行序列化。The following code example shows how to define a derived serializable class that implements the method, which makes minor changes to two properties, and then calls the base class to perform the serialization. 示例强制出现被零除错误，并创建的派生实例。The example forces a divide-by-0 error, and then creates an instance of the derived . 代码序列化到文件的实例，则反文件序列化为一个新，它将引发，，然后捕获并显示异常的数据。The code serializes the instance to a file, deserializes the file into a new , which it throws, and then catches and displays the exception's data. [!code-cpp[System.Exception.GetObjectData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Exception.GetObjectData/CPP/getobjdata.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Exception.GetObjectData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Exception.GetObjectData/CS/getobjdata.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Exception.GetObjectData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Exception.GetObjectData/VB/getobjdata.vb#1)]
